00555 #define TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, class_name, label, propagator)\
00556   {  \
00557     EUROPA::ConstraintEngine* ce = (EUROPA::ConstraintEngine*) assembly.getComponent("ConstraintEngine"); \
00558     using EUROPA::ConcreteConstraintType; \
00559     using EUROPA::LabelStr; \
00560     REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(ce->getCESchema(), class_name, #label, #propagator);\
00561   }
00562 
00563 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00564   REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00565 
00566 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00567   REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00568 
00569 #define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00570   REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00571 
00572 #define TREX_REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(assembly, class_name, label) \
00573   REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
